text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews Australian wheelchair basketball player Tina McKenzie
text.summary: Wikinews interviews paralympic medalist Tina McKenzie, a former member of the Gliders, Australia's women's national wheelchair basketball team, about her team's international games at the Paralympics and the World Cup.
